about_the_game:
This product is a token module containing top-down style tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop.

This token pack contains 20 tokens you can use to represent various Elf characters or NPCs

  • Female Elf Battle Mage
  • 2 Female Elf Clerics
  • Female Elf Rogue
  • 2 Female Elf Sorceresses
  • Female Elf Warrior
  • 2 Male Elf Archers
  • Male Elf Brooding Sorcerer
  • Male Elf Dreadnought
  • Male Elf Fighter Mage
  • Male Elf High Druid
  • Male Elf Magus
  • Male Elf Monk
  • Male Elf Ranger
  • Male Elf Red Wizard
  • Male Elf Rogue
  • Male Elf Sorcerer

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on January 21, 2016. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.1.6 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Elves (Token Pack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
